Bellflower Lactation provides evidence-based, family-focused lactation care in the Twin Cities

  • View my services
  • Read about tongue ties
  • See billing information
  • Book appointment

Bellflower Lactation provides evidence-based, family-focused lactation care in the Twin Cities. I am a Board Certified Lactation Consultant and a Board Certified Pediatric Nurse Practitioner. I value breastfeeding as a feeding choice and focus on the promotion of the mental and physical wellbeing of the whole family.

I do not push any specific feeding agenda and will work with you every step of the way to create a realistic and empowering feeding plan for your family. I strongly believe that your feeding journey is not a reflection of your success as parents or a measure of the love you have for your babies.

No matter how your family looks, where you live, what you believe or where you come from, it is my honor to work with you. The families I work with are partners in care, and I am honored and blessed to work with you at this amazing time in your family’s life.

  • Read more about me

Reasons to choose Bellflower:

  • Yale-trained Pediatric Nurse Practioner and IBCLC
  • Able to prescribe medication for common issues
  • Expertise in the diagnosis and treatment tethered oral tissues (TOTs)
  • Convenient appointments and flexible scheduling
  • Home visits available (see Services page for details)
  • Specializing in families with multiples—I’m a twin mom!
  • Will work closely with your healthcare provider if needed

The bellflower signifies unwavering love, representing not only the way we feel about our babies, but also the steadfast compassion I believe all parents deserve on their personal breastfeeding journeys.
